title: Tyophile search function
content:
Hi all.

Is there a reason why Typophiles search function isn't working for me. What ever I search for I just get 'Your search yielded no results.' - I'm using OS X, and I've tried on a number of browsers with the same results. Is anyone else having the same problem ?
author: coop

comments.content:
I tried it and was well impressed.

I got 1 matching category for "font" and a cornucopia of 2 for "type".

I got nothing for "logo" though :o(

(I'm on WinXP)

It's been broken for quite a while if I'm not mistaken.

Better results can be obtained using Google. Type "site:typophile.com [search]" in Google to search Typophile only.

eg. site:typophile.com fonts

Yeah, Search has been pretty ineffective of late.

That's probably why there have been so many "been there, done that" threads.

--Michael.

As mentioned above, Google is the best bet - unfortunately it's limited by how often the forum is crawled so you may not find the latest posts.
The search has been fixed. Kudos to Jared!

Has search really been fixed? My search for "gotham" returned 4 hits. I have to believe that word has been used many, many more times than that.
